entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Dorion
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:04 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 1:00 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -12.7°C
Wind: ENE 21 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023
